attributes.action: Close Britains Borders Until There Is Enough Dentists Etc for British Citizens!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like Britain to close its borders for all new immigrants until there is enough houses, dentists, doctors and no NHS waiting lists etc for British Citzens who have been paying National Insurance and Tax all there lives and not give priority to people who can't speak a word of English! Only open the borders for true medical emergencies

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
